channel.title: [tutish] server percentage signature [tutish]
channel.description:
to make you'r signature have your server percentile do this
(code has spaces in them were it wouldn't turn the writing red intsead of showing you the code)
[c olor= limegreen][ | |[/co lor]
(now see how i only put that bit there cause thats the percentage done now heres the part we'll put in red that isn't done
[col or= red]| | | | | ][/co lor]
the last red part were i just finished off from the last will show what isn't completed now lets combine them together
[ | | || | | ]
here is the finished code with spaces
[ | | || | | ]
if you wish to use this do not space nothing i spaced keep it all bunched together except the [ | | | those need spaces to look right
this isn't a perfect tut and its not a really needed one just something for server development
between the color=limegreen and the [ | | | is the percentage
the [ | | | | | ] is the percentage[br][size=1]Posted at: August 03, 2006, 09:14:57 PM[/size][hr]and also you may want to use the bold tags stick all the text in between the bold tags only the part you want bold for example (with spaces) [b ] hello [/b ]
thereforth ending as
[b]hello[/b]
with the percentile in bold like this (with spaces)
[b ][co lor=limegreen][ | | |[/c olor][color= red]| | | ][/c olor][/b ]
there forth ending as (without spaces) [b][ | | || | | ][/b]
using bold markings at the top above teh smileys to the top left corner of the smileys and up a few things is a [b]b[/b] now to use the bold thing click that b and type in whatever you want to be bold between the [ b] and the [/b ][br][size=1]Posted at: August 03, 2006, 09:18:55 PM[/size][hr]not even one post.. tsk tsk tsk ashamed.. the least you could do is say nooby this is spam
lol
:( i don't even get spam i must be hated :(

to make you’r signature have your server percentile do this

the last red part were i just finished off from the last will show what isn’t completed now lets combine them together

[ | | || | | ]

here is the finished code with spaces
